summary: Replaces Skyrim Masser Moon with planet of your choice...
descriptionHtml:
New Moons over Skyrim Version 1.1
=================================

=Changelog:
-All textures are now 1024x1024 NOTE** If this slows your computer down please post saying so.
I\'ll then size them down and submit. Not until then though.
-All mods replace the Masser Moon only. They are all in the \"Full\" view. I have no intentions of creating the \"cycle\" views unless requested. Personally I like to see the full view all the time.
-I have no plans of ever creating any mods to replace the Secunda Moon.
-New planets added:
Earth High Contrast
Earth Red
Mars Normal
Mars High Contrast
Moon Normal
Moon Red

Mixed mode contains one of each.

=Instructions
Extract, Choose a version and paste that textures folder to your Skyrim data folder.

Should any of you have any issues extracting the archive use 7 zip

32 Bit Users:
http://downloads.sourceforge.net/sevenzip/7z920.exe

64 Bit Users:
http://downloads.sourceforge.net/sevenzip/7z920-x64.msi

To uninstall go to \\skyrim\\Data\\textures\\sky and delete the 7 DDS files that start with the name masser.

*TIP: If the sky is cloudy press ~ and type rcc until it\'s clear.
author: vince--
